title: Is this really bannable?
body:
What is this nonsense. Suspended for telling your ADC they are playing poorly when they are objectively playing poorly. I love that the chat logs leave out the part where he calls me a "shitcan support" or something similar. Then I offer them real advice and try to improve their play. What is this company? 

Chat Logs:
Game 1
In-Game
RussianTrollB0t: vaynbe
RussianTrollB0t: g
RussianTrollB0t: my adc is garbage
RussianTrollB0t: im done
RussianTrollB0t: yeah vayne youre really bad
RussianTrollB0t: please pay attention
RussianTrollB0t: rather be toxic than not pay attention
RussianTrollB0t: and be hardstuck silver
RussianTrollB0t: stop what
RussianTrollB0t: you let me die
RussianTrollB0t: i need cs
RussianTrollB0t: to recover lost gold
RussianTrollB0t: maybe run to me next time
RussianTrollB0t: for shields and cc
RussianTrollB0t: and under the tower
RussianTrollB0t: so he takes tower shots
RussianTrollB0t: you can run to me
RussianTrollB0t: i can shield you
RussianTrollB0t: and poly him
RussianTrollB0t: unbder tower
RussianTrollB0t: and he dies
RussianTrollB0t: good
RussianTrollB0t: go afk then
RussianTrollB0t: why are you so scarewd of him
RussianTrollB0t: i have shields
RussianTrollB0t: and cc
RussianTrollB0t: you have 1/2 his cs
RussianTrollB0t: do you understand how or when to trade
RussianTrollB0t: against various comps?
RussianTrollB0t: im asking not trying to be mean
RussianTrollB0t: just ff
RussianTrollB0t: stop feeding please
RussianTrollB0t: im not an adc
RussianTrollB0t: lol
RussianTrollB0t: you have 44 cs
RussianTrollB0t: lucian has 104
RussianTrollB0t: no we dont
RussianTrollB0t: bot is oppen
RussianTrollB0t: go farm
RussianTrollB0t: vayne go farm
RussianTrollB0t: bot
RussianTrollB0t: thats not your job
RussianTrollB0t: you need to farm
RussianTrollB0t: do you know how to control a lane?
RussianTrollB0t: wtf are you doing
RussianTrollB0t: vayne im not trying to be a dick
RussianTrollB0t: you NEED to go farm
RussianTrollB0t: no not enough
RussianTrollB0t: you need to farm
RussianTrollB0t: we will defend
RussianTrollB0t: and take objectives
RussianTrollB0t: vayne doesnt listen
RussianTrollB0t: there is so chance
RussianTrollB0t: im trying to help you
RussianTrollB0t: you are too far behind to fight
RussianTrollB0t: you need to farm
RussianTrollB0t: stfu
RussianTrollB0t: why were you there
RussianTrollB0t: for no reason
RussianTrollB0t: you cant carry anything
RussianTrollB0t: vayne you are not good
RussianTrollB0t: at all

Game 2
In-Game
RussianTrollB0t: if you are not at the lane, I will take cs. stop pinging me like an ape.
RussianTrollB0t: stop talking.
RussianTrollB0t: LOL.
RussianTrollB0t: trist you are horrible.
RussianTrollB0t: How many games? 10?
RussianTrollB0t: trist there is no way in hell you have a 70% wr with 260 games. lol
RussianTrollB0t: you dont even know how to cs or counter push a lane.
RussianTrollB0t: i dont ff when p;eople int
RussianTrollB0t: GP is 1-7, shyv has no ganks or obj control, but a support MF is the reason for the loss? Get over your ego. You are mediocre

replies.body:
> RussianTrollB0t: my adc is garbage
RussianTrollB0t: im done
RussianTrollB0t: yeah vayne youre really bad

Dude, seriously?
Yes, seriously. I told someone playing poorly that they were playing poorly.

Did that help you win? Contribute to the game? Make the person magically become Challenger?

What's funny about people like you (who flame their teammates nonstop) is how selfish you can be without actually being selfish. Hear me out, and think about this. You're so hyperfocused on what a bad player is doing **to you** that you're oblivious to what you're doing **to yourself** - decreasing your chances of a win **even more** by ragging on someone who's doing poorly.

Be a little more selfish in your games. Think about what will help you win and what will help you lose.

> [{quoted}](name=GatekeeperTDS,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=FqgRLBzt,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-12-30T20:32:39.400+0000)
>
> RussianTrollB0t: im done
> RussianTrollB0t: yeah vayne youre really bad
> 
> Dude, seriously?

Riot, seriously?

I understand that your summoner name really isn't .. or at least shouldn't be a factor in determining if you are toxic or not, .. but I can't help but think it wouldn't do you any favors if you were manually reviewed. 

As for your chat logs. .. what is said to you is irrelevant. You are responsible for how you respond. 

As someone else said, you aren't helping anyone by saying they are performing poorly, much less by doing so in an insulting way by saying they are "garbage" 

Literally the only thing you said that was constructive was "maybe run to me next time" and even that comes across as though you're saying that they're too stupid to understand in the context of your other comments. Here's the thing, they may be... but you have to acknowledge that you aren't justified in saying that in game. 

If this account isn't literally banned, just don't talk like this in game. 

If this account is banned, you'll probably do what 99% of people that get their account banned do and make a new one. Don't behave like this on your new one. 

If you do, ... don't pretend to be surprised when that one gets banned too.

I want to see a rule that tells me I cannot tell someone they are playing poorly. The below seems pretty constructive to me. Literally, plenty of what I said is constructive. You are literally using that word wrong. 

"RussianTrollB0t: maybe run to me next time
RussianTrollB0t: for shields and cc
RussianTrollB0t: and under the tower
RussianTrollB0t: so he takes tower shots
RussianTrollB0t: you can run to me
RussianTrollB0t: i can shield you
RussianTrollB0t: and poly him
RussianTrollB0t: unbder tower
RussianTrollB0t: and he dies"

"RussianTrollB0t: bot is oppen
RussianTrollB0t: go farm
RussianTrollB0t: vayne go farm
RussianTrollB0t: bot
RussianTrollB0t: thats not your job
RussianTrollB0t: you need to farm
RussianTrollB0t: do you know how to control a lane?"

"RussianTrollB0t: vayne im not trying to be a dick
RussianTrollB0t: you NEED to go farm
RussianTrollB0t: no not enough
RussianTrollB0t: you need to farm
RussianTrollB0t: we will defend
RussianTrollB0t: and take objectives
RussianTrollB0t: vayne doesnt listen
RussianTrollB0t: there is so chance
RussianTrollB0t: im trying to help you
RussianTrollB0t: you are too far behind to fight
RussianTrollB0t: you need to farm"

It's not your job to tell them how to play. Nobody is elected as the team captain in matchmaking. 

There is a big difference between offering advice, or even shot calling, and micro managing. 

You may be correct in what action would be ideal but other players are free to make their own strategic decisions and you need to work around what they decide to do.

> [{quoted}](name=Elite4Runner,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=FqgRLBzt,comment-id=000400000000,timestamp=2019-12-30T20:59:24.979+0000)
>
> It's not your job to tell them how to play. Nobody is elected as the team captain in matchmaking. 
> 
> There is a big difference between offering advice, or even shot calling, and micro managing. 
> 
> You may be correct in what action would be ideal but other players are free to make their own strategic decisions and you need to work around what they decide to do.

I want to see a rule that states I can't tell them they are playing poorly. Telling someone that when they are behind in farm they are ineffective in fights isn't "micromanaging" it's a fact. It's not "shot calling." If they are free to make "strategic decisions" that don't work out, I am free to tell them those decisions aren't working out. I want to see the rule I violated.

you wanna see a rule that tells you your behavior is a rulebreak?...
YOU JUST GOT PUNISHED FOR YOUR BEHAVIOR that is literally riot saying your behavior is a rulebreak.

and yes you are free to tell them their strat isnt working.
youre not free to call them garbage ape troll etc.

What good does telling somebody hes playing poorly. Guy prob already dont feels great and isnt waiting for somebody like you to point that out. You were nothing but toxic and anoying towards your adc so  seeing  you say banned i asume you had a 14 day ban befor this ? Cause if you had it clearly says  if you would break the rules again the next punishment would be a perma ban and  you dont see sombody els chat cause it dont matter. You get punisht for your actions not for what somebody els. Who break the rules gets punisht it dont matter to them who started it or who said what if you break the rules you get punisht its that simple.
What rule did I break? There are 3 instances of saying something not nice. I called him bad. That does not warrant a suspension.

> [{quoted}](name=RussianTrollB0t,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=FqgRLBzt,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-12-30T20:39:49.575+0000)
>
> What rule did I break? There are 3 instances of saying something not nice. I called him bad. That does not warrant a suspension.

It does in this game, and now you know.

> [{quoted}](name=RussianTrollB0t,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=FqgRLBzt,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-12-30T20:39:49.575+0000)
>
> What rule did I break? There are 3 instances of saying something not nice. I called him bad. That does not warrant a suspension.

Its not about you think you dint break a rule or not its what riot thinks. Its there game so tere rules and you in there eyes broke them.

> [{quoted}](name=World peace plz,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=FqgRLBzt,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-12-30T20:31:09.078+0000)
>
>"You were nothing but toxic and anoying towards your adc so  seeing  you say banned i asume you had a 14 day ban befor this ?"

Annoying? I told him he needs to go farm and stop trying to fight when he is behind. That's not annoying, that is a fact.

> [{quoted}](name=RussianTrollB0t,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=FqgRLBzt,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2019-12-30T20:42:00.093+0000)
>
> Annoying? I told him he needs to go farm and stop trying to fight when he is behind. That's not annoying, that is a fact.

Would you like it that somebody tells you what to do like you dont knowing anything at all ? Thats anoying dude nobody really nobody likes to get told what to do when he hasnt hes game.

You virtually admit to being toxic in your chat.

How do you not understand being punished lol?

Also I'd wager the real reason you were banned is because you ALWAYS act like this. It adds up dude.
yes you are 100% toxic player

> Suspended for telling your ADC they are playing poorly when they are objectively playing poorly.

What I was expecting to see:-

> RussianTrollB0t: You need to play better bro
> RussianTrollB0t: Try to zone him off CS and trade with him when he goes for last hits
> RussianTrollB0t: And try to last hit better. You're behind in cs.
> RussianTrollB0t: ok buddy?
> RussianTrollB0t: now lets win this thing.

What I actually saw:-

> RussianTrollB0t: my adc is garbage
> RussianTrollB0t: im done

I'm guessing all the downvotes are hard stuck silver/gold. God forbid someone call you out on your terrible play. You are the reason this game has gone downhill. You're too damn sensitive. The world is bigger than your feelings, grow up.

The downvotes aren't for the gameplay or elo. The reason you think the game has gone downhill is because you think you belong in an elo higher than you actually are. Your attitude stinks btw. If you truly wanted constructive feedback, your posts wouldn't come across as scornful and condescending.

> [{quoted}](name=RussianTrollB0t,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=FqgRLBzt,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-12-30T20:23:03.072+0000)
>
> RussianTrollB0t: my adc is garbage
> RussianTrollB0t: im done
> RussianTrollB0t: yeah vayne youre really bad
> RussianTrollB0t: please pay attention
> RussianTrollB0t: rather be toxic than not pay attention
> RussianTrollB0t: and be hardstuck silver

> RussianTrollB0t: go afk then

> RussianTrollB0t: just ff
> RussianTrollB0t: stop feeding please
> RussianTrollB0t: im not an adc

> RussianTrollB0t: vayne im not trying to be a dick

> RussianTrollB0t: stfu

> RussianTrollB0t: vayne you are not good
> RussianTrollB0t: at all
> 
> Game 2
> In-Game
> RussianTrollB0t: if you are not at the lane, I will take cs. stop pinging me like an ape.
> RussianTrollB0t: stop talking.
> RussianTrollB0t: LOL.
> RussianTrollB0t: trist you are horrible.
> RussianTrollB0t: How many games? 10?
> RussianTrollB0t: trist there is no way in hell you have a 70% wr with 260 games. lol
> RussianTrollB0t: you dont even know how to cs or counter push a lane.
> RussianTrollB0t: i dont ff when p;eople int
> RussianTrollB0t: GP is 1-7, shyv has no ganks or obj control, but a support MF is the reason for the loss? Get over your ego. You are mediocre

Your first game you do a lot of belittling your adc. That isn't going to help you win a game. It only serves to fuel a fire that never should have ignited in the first place. You say you're not trying to be a ****, but really you are being one. That's enough to earn a punishment. Your second game is milder but still negative enough to be warranted a punishment. 

Maybe you should take a break and your own advice. 

>Get over your ego.

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

> [{quoted}](name=RussianTrollB0t,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=FqgRLBzt,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2019-12-30T23:26:19.080+0000)

I'd take toxicity over being trash any day of the week! 

Quit betting butt hurt over words. Mute exists for a reason.

> [{quoted}](name=RussianTrollB0t,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=FqgRLBzt,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2019-12-30T23:26:19.080+0000)
>

Your getting downvoted cause of things like this. YOUR ATITUDE is terrible. Elo has nothing to do with this


ps im diamond so the all down votes are silver/gold players is nonsense.


> God forbid someone call you out on your terrible play.

Your not supposed to do that but focus on your own plays you really think you gonna improof by calling people out instand of focus on your own mistakes and plays ? Gl with climbing with that atitude but i already can tell you wont get far with that atitude.



> You are the reason this game has gone downhill. You're too damn sensitive. The world is bigger than your feelings, grow up.

No the game would go down hill if it dint punish people like you and its not about feelings i just hate your atitude i mean you littlerly said to your adc get over your ego. The irony is so big here you calling people out like your better than them and so give you the right to call them out. That  mate is having a ego if you were better than them you would not be silver in the first place.
Look at these weebs upvoting each others' comments. Y'all are adorable. If you guys party up I'll bet you could beat the AI on any difficulty!

Game 1: 3 instances of saying something borderline "not-nice". It would be hard to even call this flaming.

Game 2: 1 instance of the same thing. Calling someone "horrible." 

This is a joke.

Who reviews this? Is this a bot that looks for keywords or phrases: "bad" "horrible" "you are bad." A sane person can't possible read these logs and see this as flaming a teammate. I didn't call them names. I didn't threaten them. I didn't bully them. This. Is. A. Joke.
Why is this thread no longer on the page?
